args: After catching word that a village was under attack\nby the imperial army, the prince and his friends\nhurry to the scene. But when they arrive...
There are slain fiends lying everywhere.\nI wager they were pressed into service\nto fight on behalf of the Empire.
And recently, too—this fiend blood\nain't even dry yet.
Whoever did this knows their way around\na sword. See how clean the cuts are!
But where is this person now, and what\nhappened to the imperial army?
Have you also come to save us?
Yer from here, yeah? Care to tell us\nwhat went down?
A knight came and told us to hide in the\nchurch. We only recently emerged to\nfind...all of this.
This knight must have driven off the\nimperial army and slain the fiends.
I saw her from the window! She killed\nall the fiends, then ran into the woods!
Then the army all chased after her.
Thus preventing further damage to the\nvillage. Most admirable indeed.
Ya thinkin' what I'm thinkin', boss?
We enter the woods and find this knight?\nOf course I am. Let's go!
...Blast! Who IS this woman?!\nHer blade is like lightning!
Abandon this foolishness and withdraw\nfrom the village if you value your lives.
Big talk—but let's see how big you are\nwhen you face THIS! ...Bring it out, boys!
I shall interpret that response as refusal.\nHave at you!
Damn! She's a tough one, all right!\nAnd somehow familiar...
I've brought it, Commander! I just\nhave to... Wait. WAIT! NOOOOO!
This one is far larger and more\naggressive than the others;\nyou don't stand a CHANCE!
You would willingly rely on beasts that\ntrample your own men underfoot?
You daft fools have no idea how\ntruly dangerous fiends can be!
...Wait. I know who you are now!
Heh. This thing can't wait to fight!\nRight! Fall in behind the fiend, men—\nand for hell's sake, don't get trampled!
This is a powerful foe indeed,\nbut I shall not give in!
The prince joins the fray? Excellent!\nGo, my fiend! Destroy them all!
How can something this big not leave us\na single opening to strike?!
I shall make your opening by serving as a\ndecoy. Use this chance to lay it low!
Come, fiend! I shall be your opponent!
Damn, look at her go! She's close enough\nto that thing what to smell its breath!
But she's keeping it engaged.\nThis is our chance!
Looks like yer the only one left, bud.\nStill itchin' for a fight?
You'll pay for this, traitorous prince!\nAs will you, fiend-hating rebel!
And he called you the traitorous\nprince. That would make you...
It is an honor to finally meet you,\nYour Highness!
Er...thanks? But there's really no need to\nbow to me like that. Maybe just, um,\nstart by telling me who you are?
My name is Lea, and I am a former\nknight of Alberia.

Lea... I know that name. There was a
special division of the knights that was
dedicated to fighting fiends, and she was
their ace.
Hey, I remember those guys!\nTough as nails, all of 'em!
I heard plenty of tales about their leader.\nGuy was really supposed to be somethin'!
How did you come to be seen as a rebel?
Now that the Empire has seized the wheel\nof power, they use fiends as a part of\ntheir military operations.
They seek only to strike fear into the hearts\nof the people, which I find unconscionable.
When I protested to my superiors,\nthey named me a traitor and ordered\nmy immediate execution.
So ya took off rather than get the noose?\nSucks, but I get it.
Judging by how you reacted when\nyou found him, I assume you have\nbeen looking for {player_name}?

Indeed I have. I spent my early days on
the run slaying fiends I happened across,
and at some point caught wind of a certain
prince's daring exploits.

The tales of you taking up the sword for
your people moved me deeply. I knew
you had to be the one who inherited
the true spirit of Alberia.
Will you grant me the honor of fighting\nat your side, Highness?
Are you kidding? We'd LOVE to have you.
Er, but we're all friends here, so if you\nwant to stick around, maybe ease up on\nthe formality and bowing and...so forth.
B-but Your Highness is royalty!\nI must show deference to your station!
And if that royalty orders ya NOT to\ntreat him like royalty, ya kinda gotta\nsuck it up and do it, yeah?
V-very well. I shall endeavor to be\nless...er...formal.
Then let us return to the village.\nI imagine everyone will want to\nknow that the army has retreated.
And then we'll throw us a welcome party\nfor Lea! Yeeeee-haw!
Must you get so carried away by\nevery little thing, Ranzal?
Heh. Let's just get back, all right?
(I shall not let you down, Father.\nI shall see that your good works\ncontinue at this prince's side.)
